# Introduction
This package was originally desiged for the Post-analysis of CNV reuslts inferred from PennCNV and GenomeStudio. And then it expanded to do the post-analysis of ROH from Plink and GenomeStudio. It's aimed to provide a Standard, reproducible and timesaving pipelines for the CNV and ROH summarision, annotation, comparison and visualizsion.
